mapper.select: SELECT /* PaymentInfoMapper.xml, searchProdType, SAC 전시, 2014-04-14 */ CASE WHEN B.PART_PARENT_CLSF_CD = 'PD012302' -- In-App 자식 상품 THEN (SELECT TOP_MENU_ID FROM TB_DP_PROD WHERE PROD_ID = C.PROD_ID) ELSE A.TOP_MENU_ID END AS TOP_MENU_ID ,A.SVC_GRP_CD ,CASE WHEN B.PART_PARENT_CLSF_CD = 'PD012302' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS IN_APP_YN FROM TB_DP_PROD A ,TB_DP_APP_PROD B ,TB_DP_PROD_RSHP C WHERE A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID(+) AND A.PROD_ID = C.PART_PROD_ID(+) AND C.PROD_RSHP_CD(+) = 'DP010801' /* DP010801 : 부모-자식 관계 */ AND A.PROD_ID = #{prodId}

SELECT /* PaymentInfoMapper.xml, searchPaymentInfo, SAC 전시, 2014-04-14 */ A.PROD_ID ,B.PROD_NM ,D.PROD_AMT ,C.PROD_STATUS_CD ,A.PROD_GRD_CD ,CASE WHEN (CASE WHEN A.TOP_MENU_ID = 'DP13' THEN CASE WHEN #{ebookSprtYn} = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END WHEN A.TOP_MENU_ID = 'DP14' THEN CASE WHEN #{comicSprtYn} = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END WHEN A.TOP_MENU_ID = 'DP15' THEN 0 WHEN A.TOP_MENU_ID = 'DP16' THEN CASE WHEN A.META_CLSF_CD = 'CT25' THEN CASE WHEN #{musicSprtYn} = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ELSE 1 END WHEN A.TOP_MENU_ID IN ('DP17', 'DP18') THEN CASE WHEN NVL(A.DRM_YN, 'N') = 'Y' AND #{videoDrmSprtYn} = 'N' THEN 0 ELSE CASE WHEN #{sdVideoSprtYn} = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END END ELSE 1 END) = 1 -- 단말 지원정보 AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_DP_SPRT_DEVICE WHERE PROD_ID = A.PROD_ID AND (DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelCd} OR DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{dpAnyPhone4mm}) ) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS PROD_SPRT_YN ,A.DRM_YN ,A.USE_PERIOD_UNIT_CD ,A.USE_PERIOD ,(SELECT AID FROM TB_DP_APP_PROD WHERE PROD_ID = A.PROD_ID) AS AID ,A.MALL_CD ,F.OUTSD_CONTENTS_ID ,A.SELLER_MBR_NO ,A.EXPO_SELLER_NM AS SELLER_NM ,A.EXPO_SELLER_EMAIL AS SELLER_EMAIL ,A.EXPO_SELLER_TELNO AS SELLER_TELNO ,F.POSS_LEND_CLSF_CD FROM TB_DP_PROD A ,TB_DP_PROD_DESC B ,TB_DP_TENANT_PROD C ,TB_DP_TENANT_PROD_PRICE D ,UV_TB_DP_MULTIMDA_PROD F WHERE A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND B.LANG_CD = #{langCd} AND A.PROD_ID = C.PROD_ID AND C.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND C.PROD_ID = D.PROD_ID AND C.TENANT_ID = D.TENANT_ID AND A.PROD_ID = F.PROD_ID(+) AND A.PROD_ID = #{prodId}

/* PaymentInfoMapper.xml, getAvailableFixrateProdIdList,결제시 상품 리스트(정액권), 김형식/SK플래닛, 2014-02-27 */ SELECT IV.* FROM ( SELECT PD.PROD_ID FROM TB_DP_PROD PD , TB_DP_CMPX_PROD CM , TB_DP_PROD_DESC DC , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD TP , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD_PRICE PR ,(SELECT A.PROD_ID , B.PART_PROD_ID FROM TB_DP_FIXRATE_PROD_MAPG A ,TB_DP_PROD_RSHP B WHERE A.PART_PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND B.PROD_RSHP_CD =#{prodRshpCd} /*채널-에피소드 상품 관계*/ AND B.PART_PROD_ID= #{prodId} )PM WHERE PD.PROD_ID = CM.PROD_ID AND PD.PROD_ID = DC.PROD_ID AND PD.PROD_ID = TP.PROD_ID AND PD.PROD_ID = PR.PROD_ID AND PD.PROD_ID = PM.PROD_ID AND DC.LANG_CD = #{lang} AND TP.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND TP.TENANT_ID = PR.TENANT_ID AND SYSDATE BETWEEN PR.APPLY_START_DT AND PR.APPLY_END_DT ) IV

/* PaymentInfoMapper.xml, getFreePassMetaInfo,결제시 상품 리스트(정액권), 김형식/SK플래닛, 2014-02-27 */ SELECT IV.* FROM ( SELECT PD.PROD_ID , DC.PROD_NM , PR.PROD_AMT , TP.PROD_STATUS_CD , PD.PROD_GRD_CD ,CASE WHEN ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_DP_SPRT_DEVICE SP WHERE 1=1 AND SP.PROD_ID = PD.PROD_ID AND 'Y' = CASE WHEN CM.CMPX_PROD_CLSF_CD IN ('OR004301','OR004302') THEN #{supportDevice.vodFixisttSprtYn} WHEN CM.CMPX_PROD_CLSF_CD IN ('OR004303','OR004304') THEN CASE WHEN PD.TOP_MENU_ID='DP13' THEN #{supportDevice.ebookSprtYn} WHEN PD.TOP_MENU_ID='DP14' THEN #{supportDevice.comicSprtYn} ELSE 'Y' END ELSE 'Y' END AND (SP.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelCd} or SP.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{dpAnyPhone4mm}) )> 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS PROD_SPRT_YN , PD.DRM_YN , PD.USE_PERIOD_UNIT_CD , PD.USE_PERIOD , '' as aid , CONCAT(CONCAT(PD.SVC_GRP_CD, '||' ),PD.TOP_MENU_ID) as tenantProdGrpCd , CM.CMPX_PROD_CLSF_CD , PD.MALL_CD ,'' AS outsdContentsId , PD.SELLER_MBR_NO , PD.EXPO_SELLER_EMAIL AS sellerEmail , PD.EXPO_SELLER_NM AS sellerNm , PD.EXPO_SELLER_TELNO AS sellerTelno , CM.AUTO_APPR_YN AS autoPrchsYN , PD.USE_PERIOD_UNIT_CD AS autoPrchsPeriodUnitCd , PD.USE_PERIOD AS autoPrchsPeriodValue , '' AS autoPrchsLastDt , CM.BNS_CASH_AMT , CM.BNS_USE_PERIOD_UNIT_CD , CM.BNS_USE_PERIOD FROM TB_DP_PROD PD , TB_DP_CMPX_PROD CM , TB_DP_PROD_DESC DC , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD TP , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD_PRICE PR WHERE PD.PROD_ID = CM.PROD_ID AND PD.PROD_ID = DC.PROD_ID AND PD.PROD_ID = TP.PROD_ID AND PD.PROD_ID = PR.PROD_ID AND PD.PROD_ID = #{prodId} AND DC.LANG_CD = #{lang} AND TP.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND TP.TENANT_ID = PR.TENANT_ID AND SYSDATE BETWEEN PR.APPLY_START_DT AND PR.APPLY_END_DT ) IV
